name: MLCInstanceNormalizationLayer
desc: A layer that normalizes all features of one channel.

items.name: init?(featureChannelCount: Int, beta: MLCTensor?, gamma: MLCTensor?, varianceEpsilon: Float)
items.desc: Creates an instance normalization layer with the number of feature channels, beta and gamma tensors, and variance epsilon you specify.

items.name: init?(featureChannelCount: Int, beta: MLCTensor?, gamma: MLCTensor?, varianceEpsilon: Float, momentum: Float)
items.desc: Creates an instance normalization layer with the number of feature channels, beta and gamma tensors, variance epsilon, and momentum you specify.

items.name: init?(featureChannelCount: Int, mean: MLCTensor, variance: MLCTensor, beta: MLCTensor?, gamma: MLCTensor?, varianceEpsilon: Float, momentum: Float)
items.desc: Creates an instance normalization layer with the number of feature channels, mean, variance, beta and gamma tensors, variance epsilon, and momentum you specify.

items.name: var betaParameter: MLCTensorParameter?
items.desc: The beta tensor parameter you use for optimizer updates.

items.name: var gammaParameter: MLCTensorParameter?
items.desc: The gamma tensor parameter you use for optimizer updates.

items.name: var momentum: Float
items.desc: The momentum value for the running mean and variance computation.

items.name: var varianceEpsilon: Float
items.desc: The variance epsilon you use for numerical stability.
